pageContext.claim: “If you look at manufacturing indexes, the most enthusiasm we've had in many years, I mean 94-95 percent.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is referring to a report from the National Association of Manufacturers. Its manufacturer optimism survey was 88 percent in the fourth quarter of 2018, not 94-95 percent. The survey reached an all-time high of 92.4 percent in 2018, but had dipped since October.
